predicate.note: Frames file for 'soothe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: However , at a news conference Thursday , Mrs. Aquino backed the project and said [0] her government was attempting [*-1] to soothe the feelings of residents at the original site , adjacent to the government 's major petroleum refinery in Bataan province .
example.arg: the feelings of residents at the original site , adjacent to the government 's major petroleum refinery in Bataan province
